title: Vayne or Graves
body: What champion should i buy next? torn between those two. or any suggestions of a fun champ

replies.body:
Depends on your playstyle. Vayne is more mobile and focuses on sustained damage, Graves is a lot more burst.

Play Yorick, win games, have fun pressing all the buttons. It's like old Sona!
Dont suggest Yorick, thats cruel to the player and the champion.
Vanye West is the voice of our generation and she will take no shit from anyone.
Graves is burst, with a HUGE powerspike quite early in the game. Vayne takes time to farm up, but her lategame is usually unstoppable if she hasn't fed and just played safe :)

Really depends. Vayne is a late game single target dps marksman, with a better focus on mobility and kiting. She is also among the best AD carries for 1v1ing late game.

Graves is an early-mid game marksman with a higher focus on killing enemies flat out in 2 seconds over raw sustained damage. Graves is the better solo que pick by far, so that would be my recomendation.
If soloQ, go Graves. Vayne is late game, and in soloQ, your teammates will try to go ham and feed early most of the time. You can't play vayne against a 5/0 assassin. It isn't fun.
Graves is more meta and easier to use than Vayne. It really depends on if you want a challenging ADC or a simple ADC.
